definition: see 如人飲水，冷暖自知|如人饮水，冷暖自知[ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1]
the person who drinks it knows best whether the water is hot or cold (Zen proverb); self-awareness comes from within/to know best by personal experience
pinyin: ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1

sentences.english: Standing all by myself, body and shadow comforting each other.
sentences.chinese: 冷暖自知，與本人的影子相互撫慰。

sentences.english: I am a cup of boiling water, run.
sentences.chinese: 我是一杯白開水，冷暖自知。

sentences.english: As to which more appropriate oneself, water like the person, changes in temperature from cicada.
sentences.chinese: 至於哪個更合適自己，就如人飲水，冷暖自知了。

sentences.english: Then let articulate the heart become ever albatross.
sentences.chinese: 那就讓冷暖自知的心成爲自己永遠的包袱。

sentences.english: Just suddenly found lengnuanzizhi is how to let person feel sorry.
sentences.chinese: 只是突然發現冷暖自知是如何讓人覺得遺憾。

sentences.english: Life is a barren travel, affair, and pain in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 人生是場荒蕪的旅行，冷暖自知，苦樂在心。

sentences.english: Happiness is like drinking water, affair.
sentences.chinese: 幸福如同飲水，冷暖自知。

definition: the person who drinks it knows best whether the water is hot or cold (Zen proverb); self-awareness comes from within/to know best by personal experience
pinyin: ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1

definition: sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life

Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: lit. daily changes of temperature/fig. well-being/sb's comfort, health, prosperity etc
affairs of life/things of the world
at home wherever one is (idiom); ready to adapt/flexible/to accept circumstances with good will
lit. having crossed the vast ocean (idiom)/fig. widely experienced in the vicissitudes of life
to come to accept an unpleasant fact/to get over sth/to cheer up
